attributes.action: All the U.K. should be included in any second Scottish independence referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The UK will be weakened, particularly in defence terms, if it is broken up. Anything that potentially affects U.K. security and prosperity must be voted on by all of us. Many of us are loyal to our UK and it cannot just be broken up without all the UK having a vote.
attributes.background: The Scottish Government is planning a second Independence referendum. If the UK is to be split, then all the UK should have a say in this as is a UK matter and affects us all. So England, Wales and Ulster should also vote on this, not just Scotland only.
